title: Daily Reminder that my favorite Midl- Support..... is still in the gutter
body:
Riot I don't care if you want him to be a support many people want to be a midlaner. Please fix malzahar, revert him back to Pre 6.23 and find some other way to make voidlings more tolerable.
~Silvrr

replies.body:
Ah yes, I miss the Malz from before the original rework where I could push to the inhib fairly safely without ever going b, doing 2v1's against mid and jungle on the way. Then when the top or bot laners came I would go B, buy a deathcap, boots, and the spell vamp book while my team took side lane turrets, then I go push for game.

Sometimes I had to get the hextech revolver before I could start shoving turrets if my opponent was good. Would probably do catalyst or something nowadays, or just a needlessly large rod.

Good times, good times.
